overview: i work for Exhibit Flooring Australia - An authorized Snaplock RaceDeck Reseller. We manufacture, sell, and install garage floors, commercial flooring, epoxy floors and exhibition floors. We offer flooring in seven garage floor tile styles, fourteen standard colors and millions of custom color garage flooring tile options. Visit: 15 Merola Way CAMPBELLFIELD , VIC 3061, Melbourne, Victoria. http://www.exhibitflooring.com.au
